Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: பெருமை யுடையவர் ஆற்றுவார் ஆற்றின்அருமை உடைய செயல்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: The man endowed with greatness true, Rare deeds in perfect wise will do.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A truly great individual ('Perumai Udayavar') is depicted calmly and skillfully performing a monumental and difficult task ('Arumai Udaya Seyal')—such as perfectly carving a massive stone temple tower or navigating a ship through a treacherous storm.
Layered_Composition.Midground: Others are shown in the background struggling with or failing at lesser versions of the same task, highlighting the unique capability of the great person.
Layered_Composition.Background: An epic, awe-inspiring landscape that matches the scale of the difficult deed, such as a towering mountain range or a vast, stormy sea.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: Illustrating that the hallmark of greatness is the ability to perform difficult, rare, and valuable actions with skill and composure.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The sheer scale and difficulty of the task is the central element. The calm, focused demeanor of the great person contrasts with the struggle of others.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: Dramatic, cinematic lighting that highlights the action. God rays breaking through clouds or intense light from a forge could illuminate the scene. A palette of strong, primary colors to convey power and focus.

Technical_Cues.Camera: Ultra-wide cinematic shot, low angle, to emphasize the epic scale of the action and the mastery of the individual.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, hyper-realistic, capturing dynamic action, weather effects, and fine details of the craft.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: High-contrast, volumetric lighting, lens flares, creating a heroic and cinematic feel.
Technical_Cues.Art_Genre: Epic historical realism, similar to a grand cinematic matte painting.

Cultural_Anchors: அருமை உடைய செயல் (Deeds of rare excellence)

Negative_Prompt: struggling main character, small-scale task, calm background, modern tools, text artifacts, blurry, cartoonish.
